character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Outlander Feature: • You can always remember the layout of a region's geographical features, and can usually find enough food and water for six people Barbarian Features: • 2/day you gain advantage on Str checks and saves, deal +2 damage on strength based melee attacks, and resistance vs bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage • Add Con mod to AC when not wearing armor • Dual Wielder: You can draw/stow two weapons per round, you can dual wield non-light weapons, and you gain +1 AC while dual wielding • You can gain advantage on Str based melee attacks by granting advantage to attacks against you for the round • You gain advantage on Dex saves vs things you can see it • Barbarian Archetype: Berserker • Can choose to frenzy when you enter a rage, gaining an attack as a bonus action but causing exhaustion after raging ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠Musical Rock ⊠Common Common Common ⊠longsword handaxe (2) javelin (4) explorer's pack staff hunting trap trophy set of traveler's clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Barbarian 3⊠Human⊠Outlander⊠NG⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Ulmeck the Meanderer⊠Barbarian 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠900
